gov.ornl.csed.csiir.sava.stucco.models

Class Context

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.csed.csiir.sava.stucco.models.Context

  • public class Context
extends java.lang.Object
    Represents the context (i.e. features) of a word within a sentence. The context is used to train a perceptron model, and is used by a perceptron model to assign a new label to a word.

        Add more context for the current word by adding information about the word that appeared right before it in the sentence.
        Parameters:
        prevWord - the word that appeared right before the currentWord
        prevPOS - the part of speech tag assigned to the previous word
        prevIOB - the I-O-B format tag for the previous word
